alert.note: Alert for Adams; Highland; Pike (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 4:14PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHWESTERN ADAMS, NORTHWESTERN PIKE AND SOUTHEASTERN HIGHLAND COUNTIES THROUGH 445 PM EDT... At 414 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located over Seaman, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Peebles, Winchester, Marshall, Seaman, Belfast, Rocky Fork Point, Cynthiana, Highland Holiday, Emerald, Cherry Fork, Sinking Spring, Rocky Fork Lake, Poplar Grove, May Hill, Serpent Mound, Locust Grove, Berrysville, Smoky Corners and Highland County Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
